Package com.company.models

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.company.models.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PotencyCalculator, java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DamageDealer, Healer, Tank
    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Thread
implements PotencyCalculator
    This class will be the abstract class of all type of roles. Since they will use same values, we created this abstract class. We also have constructor here, because I did not want to make my code more complex for reader. When I use "super" in other classes which extends "Player", I can easily control Player class. Again I used protected fields to improve safety of my program. Moreover, I controlled protected fields with getters and setters.
